definition: to disobey/to violate/to separate/to go against

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The young man explained why they stopped us.
sentences.chinese: 他解釋他被要求抓違章者的原因。

sentences.english: The club reserves the right to disqualify anybody's membership by the rules;
sentences.chinese: 俱樂部有權根據活動規則中止違章者的會員資格。

sentences.english: He explained the reason why he was made to catch the offenders.
sentences.chinese: 他解釋他被要求抓違章者的原因。
